plot: Didi, a country boy wrongly accused of theft and detained, struggles and loses his innocence by his encounter with the oppressiveness of the real world: class, law and sexuality.
title: Kong peh tshat
plot_es: Didi, a country boy wrongly accused of theft and detained, struggles and loses his innocence by his encounter with the oppressiveness of the real world: class, law and sexuality.
plot_en: Didi, a country boy wrongly accused of theft and detained, struggles and loses his innocence by his encounter with the oppressiveness of the real world: class, law and sexuality.
